summary.span: 代表索引鍵/值組的安全執行緒集合，此集合可由多個執行緒並行存取。

span.span: Represents a thread-safe collection of key/value pairs that can be accessed by multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 針對非常大型物件，您也可以將組態項目設定為 64 位元系統上增加到 2 gb (GB) 的最大陣列大小`true`在執行階段環境中。For very large objects, you can increase the maximum array size to 2 gigabytes (GB) on a 64-bit system by setting the configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. > [!NOTE] > 會實作並開頭的介面[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，類別未實作這些介面。 implements the and interfaces starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the class did not implement these interfaces. 像是類別，實作介面。Like the class, implements the interface. 颾魤 ㄛ中加入或更新索引鍵/值組，在字典中，提供數種方法下, 表中所述。In addition, provides several methods for adding or updating key/value pairs in the dictionary, as described in the following table. |若要執行此工作To do this|使用這個方法Use this method|使用方式附註Usage notes| |----------------|---------------------|-----------------| |如果它尚未存在字典中，新的金鑰新增至字典，Add a new key to the dictionary, if it doesn't already exist in the dictionary||這個方法會將指定的索引鍵/值組中，如果索引鍵的字典中目前沒有。This method adds the specified key/value pair, if the key doesn't currently exist in the dictionary. 此方法會傳回`true`或`false`取決於是否已加入新的組。The method returns `true` or `false` depending on whether the new pair was added.| |值更新為現有的索引鍵在字典中，如果該索引鍵具有特定值Update the value for an existing key in the dictionary, if that key has a specific value||這個方法會檢查金鑰是否為指定的值，而且如果它，以新值來更新金鑰。This method checks whether the key has a specified value, and if it does, updates the key with a new value. 類似於方法，但是它的已使用的字典項目。It's similar to the method, except that it's used for dictionary elements.| |無條件地，儲存在字典中的索引鍵/值組，並覆寫已存在的索引鍵的值Store a key/value pair in the dictionary unconditionally, and overwrite the value of a key that already exists|索引子 setter: `dictionary[key] = newValue`The indexer's setter: `dictionary[key] = newValue`|| |索引鍵/值組加入字典中，或如果金鑰已存在，更新索引鍵的現有值為基礎的索引鍵的值Add a key/value pair to the dictionary, or if the key already exists, update the value for the key based on the key's existing value|

-或--or-

| 可接受的金鑰和兩個委派。 accepts the key and two delegates. 它會使用第一個委派，如果索引鍵不存在於字典中;它接受鍵，並傳回應該加入索引鍵的值。It uses the first delegate if the key doesn't exist in the dictionary; it accepts the key and returns the value that should be added for the key. 它會使用第二個委派，如果索引鍵不存在;它可接受的索引鍵和其目前的值，並傳回新的值應該設定為索引鍵。It uses the second delegate if the key does exist; it accepts the key and its current value, and it returns the new value that should be set for the key.

接受索引鍵，若要加入，值和更新委派。 accepts the key, a value to add, and the update delegate. 這等同於先前的多載，不同之處在於它不會使用委派來新增金鑰。This is the same as the previous overload, except that it doesn't use a delegate to add a key.| |取得在字典中，將值加入至字典，並將其傳回，如果索引鍵不存在的索引鍵的值Get the value for a key in the dictionary, adding the value to the dictionary and returning it if the key doesn't exist|

-或--or-

|這些多載會提供索引鍵/值組在字典中，新增此值，只有當找不到的延遲初始設定。These overloads provide lazy initialization for a key/value pair in the dictionary, adding the value only if it's not there.

取得要加入的機碼如果不存在的值。 takes the value to be added if the key doesn't exist.

會接受委派，會產生值，如果索引鍵不存在。 takes a delegate that will generate the value if the key doesn't exist.| 所有這些作業是不可部分完成，並是安全執行緒上的所有其他作業方面類別。All these operations are atomic and are thread-safe with regards to all other operations on the class. 唯一的例外狀況是接受委派，也就是方法和。The only exceptions are the methods that accept a delegate, that is, and . 修改，以及寫入至字典中，作業使用更細緻的鎖定以確保執行緒安全性。For modifications and write operations to the dictionary, uses fine-grained locking to ensure thread safety. （在字典上的讀取作業會在無鎖定的方式執行）。不過，若要避免發生的問題，可以從執行不明的程式碼，在鎖定下鎖定外部呼叫這些方法的委派。(Read operations on the dictionary are performed in a lock-free manner.) However, delegates for these methods are called outside the locks to avoid the problems that can arise from executing unknown code under a lock. 因此，這些委派所執行的程式碼不需作業的不可部分完成性。Therefore, the code executed by these delegates is not subject to the atomicity of the operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建構物件。The following example shows how to construct a object. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/cs/concdictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentdictionary/vb/concdictionary.vb#1)]

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 不過，透過其中一個介面存取成員實作，包括擴充方法，不保證是安全執行緒，而且可能需要由呼叫端進行同步處理。

span.span: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the implements, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空的、具有預設並行層級、具有預設初始容量，並且使用索引鍵類型的預設比較子。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default concurrency level, has the default initial capacity, and uses the default comparer for the key type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設並行層級等於 Cpu 數目。The default concurrency level is equal to the number of CPUs. 高並行處理等級，更多的並行寫入作業可以進行而不干擾和封鎖。The higher the concurrency level is, the more concurrent write operations can take place without interference and blocking. 較高的並行層級值也會造成需要的所有鎖定的作業 (例如，資料表調整其大小`ToArray`和`Count`) 變得更耗費資源。Higher concurrency level values also cause operations that require all locks (for example, table resizing, `ToArray` and `Count`) to become more expensive. 建構的大型字典時，預設容量 (DEFAULT_CAPACITY)，它代表 bucket 初始數量，是字典的非常小型的大小和調整大小的數目之間的取捨。The default capacity (DEFAULT_CAPACITY), which represents the initial number of buckets, is a trade-off between the size of a very small dictionary and the number of resizes when constructing a large dictionary. 此外，容量不能以小的質數整除。Also, the capacity should not be divisible by a small prime number. 預設的容量為 31。The default capacity is 31.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您呼叫同時在不同的執行緒上`addValueFactory`可呼叫多次，但是其索引鍵/值組可能不會新增至每個呼叫的字典。If you call simultaneously on different threads, `addValueFactory` may be called multiple times, but its key/value pair might not be added to the dictionary for every call. 修改，以及寫入至字典中，作業使用更細緻的鎖定以確保執行緒安全性。For modifications and write operations to the dictionary, uses fine-grained locking to ensure thread safety. （在字典上的讀取作業會在無鎖定的方式執行）。不過，`addValueFactory`和`updateValueFactory`外部的鎖定，以避免發生的問題，可以從執行不明的程式碼，在鎖定下呼叫委派。(Read operations on the dictionary are performed in a lock-free manner.) However, the `addValueFactory` and `updateValueFactory` delegates are called outside the locks to avoid the problems that can arise from executing unknown code under a lock. 因此，不是關於所有其他作業的不可部分完成類別。Therefore, is not atomic with regards to all other operations on the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化，以及如何使用 AddOrUpdate 方法來新增額外的項目加入集合中，並更新現有的項目。The following code example shows how to initialize an and how to use the AddOrUpdate method to add an additional item to the collection, and update the existing items. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ConcurrentColAddUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrentcoladdupdate/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ConcurrentColAddUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrentcoladdupdate/vb/module1.vb#1)] ## Remarks 修改，以及寫入至字典中，作業使用更細緻的鎖定以確保執行緒安全性。For modifications and write operations to the dictionary, uses fine-grained locking to ensure thread safety. （在字典上的讀取作業會在無鎖定的方式執行）。不過，`updateValueFactory`之外的鎖定，以避免發生的問題，可以從執行不明的程式碼，在鎖定下呼叫委派。(Read operations on the dictionary are performed in a lock-free manner.) However, the `updateValueFactory` delegate is called outside the locks to avoid the problems that can arise from executing unknown code under a lock. 因此，不是關於所有其他作業的不可部分完成類別。Therefore, is not atomic with regards to all other operations on the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您呼叫同時在不同的執行緒上`addValueFactory`可呼叫多次，但是其索引鍵/值組可能不會新增至每個呼叫的字典。If you call simultaneously on different threads, `addValueFactory` may be called multiple times, but its key/value pair might not be added to the dictionary for every call. 修改，以及寫入至字典中，作業使用更細緻的鎖定以確保執行緒安全性。For modifications and write operations to the dictionary, uses fine-grained locking to ensure thread safety. （在字典上的讀取作業會在無鎖定的方式執行）。不過，`addValueFactory`和`updateValueFactory`外部的鎖定，以避免發生的問題，可以從執行不明的程式碼，在鎖定下呼叫委派。(Read operations on the dictionary are performed in a lock-free manner.) However, the `addValueFactory` and `updateValueFactory` delegates are called outside the locks to avoid the problems that can arise from executing unknown code under a lock. 因此，不是關於所有其他作業的不可部分完成類別。Therefore, is not atomic with regards to all other operations on the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修改，以及寫入至字典中，作業使用更細緻的鎖定以確保執行緒安全性。For modifications and write operations to the dictionary, uses fine-grained locking to ensure thread safety. （在字典上的讀取作業會在無鎖定的方式執行）。不過，`valueFactory`之外的鎖定，以避免發生的問題，可以從執行不明的程式碼，在鎖定下呼叫委派。(Read operations on the dictionary are performed in a lock-free manner.) However, the `valueFactory` delegate is called outside the locks to avoid the problems that can arise from executing unknown code under a lock. 因此，不是關於所有其他作業的不可部分完成類別。Therefore, is not atomic with regards to all other operations on the class. 因為索引鍵/值可以由另一個執行緒時插入`valueFactory`會產生值，您不能信任，因為`valueFactory`執行，其所產生的值將會插入字典並傳回。Since a key/value can be inserted by another thread while `valueFactory` is generating a value, you cannot trust that just because `valueFactory` executed, its produced value will be inserted into the dictionary and returned. 如果您呼叫同時在不同的執行緒上`valueFactory`可呼叫多次，但是只有一個索引鍵/值組會加入至字典。If you call simultaneously on different threads, `valueFactory` may be called multiple times, but only one key/value pair will be added to the dictionary. 傳回的值取決於字典和索引鍵/值是否插入之後的另一個執行緒中的索引鍵是否存在之前稱為`valueFactory`會產生一個值：The return value depends on the presence of the key in the dictionary and whether a key/value is inserted by another thread after is called but before `valueFactory` generates a value: | 情節Scenario | 傳回值Return value | | -------- | ------------ | | 在字典中已有索引鍵。The key is already in the dictionary. | 會傳回現有的值。The existing value is returned. | | 索引鍵不在字典中。The key is not in the dictionary. `valueFactory` 產生值。`valueFactory` generates a value. 在 重新檢查索引鍵，位於沒有索引鍵。On rechecking for the key, no key is found. | 索引鍵/值會插入到字典，且會傳回值。The key/value is inserted into the dictionary, and the value is returned. | | 索引鍵不在字典中。The key is not in the dictionary. `valueFactory` 產生值。`valueFactory` generates a value. 雖然`valueFactory`是產生的值，不同的執行緒插入索引鍵的值。While `valueFactory` is generating the value, a different thread inserts a value for the key. 之後`valueFactory`執行時重新檢查索引鍵，另一個執行緒所插入的索引鍵找不到。After `valueFactory` executes and upon rechecking for the key, the key inserted by the other thread is found. | 會傳回另一個執行緒插入的值。The value inserted by the other thread is returned. |
